3: I can't take these guards down... fast enough...
Commandant! I can't last much longer if this continues... You have to run for the opening I create as soon as the alarm on my frame pings!
I will fight to my last breath to make sure you can get out!

2: There has to be another way!
4: I won't leave you behind, Lucia!

3: I've made my decision! I'll push you away myself if I have to when the time comes!
The Queen has extended her invitation into her chamber to this human... Servants! Bring me that human!
You said you're a royal guard, but I don't see any difference between you and those servants of yours...
(His frame is heavily damaged) I received Commandant's request for assistance by the time I climbed out from underground... I must prioritize Commandant's safety...
What have you done to yourself?!
The guards tried to keep me inside a tunnel, so I collapsed it... and here I am.
(Points his gun toward the Iron Maiden) I've crossed paths with her before... She bolted halfway through... It seems like her target is the commandant.
You're right. She was very unambiguous about that.
If that Queen of yours wants to see Commandant, you'll have to go through us first.
You dare defy Her Majesty's will?! Constructs, you don't even deserve to be servants!
